page.title: 20RELIGION IN BALFRON AREA
page.content: There are two places of worship in the area - the{North Church,}Church of Scotland and {St. Anthony's, }Roman Catholic Chapel. There is no evidence of religious prejudice but there is an overall caring attitude throughout the community. {Acknowledgements:- Grateful thanks are due to the following people who so kindly gave their time and support to the Project. Mrs. Crews, Matron, Old folks' Home Mrs. Davidson,Endrick Valley R.D.A. Mr. J.Fleming, Rector, Balfron High. Rev.J.Jamieson,Minister, N.Church. Dr. B.D.Keighley,The Clinic,Balfron. Mrs. Murphy, Librarian. Representatives of Police, Fire, Bus and Ambulance Services. Mrs.E.Baird, the pupils of P.5 and their parents, including Mr.& Mrs.E. Clark for the use of their computer.
